meanings.definition: A person who decorates or renovates a space.
meanings.sent1: The talented redecorators transformed the dull room into a cozy haven.
meanings.sent2: We hired professional redecorators to give our living room a fresh look.
meanings.sent3: The redecorators joked that they could make a cave look like a palace.
meanings.sent4: Her artistic eye made her a redecorator who could turn any space into a work of art.
meanings.sent5: The redecorators' magic touch made the old house feel brand new.

meanings.definition: The act of decorating or renovating a space.
meanings.sent1: After the redecorators finished, the house felt like a whole new place.
meanings.sent2: Redecorators often use color schemes to enhance the beauty of a room.
meanings.sent3: The redecorators' tools clinked and clanked as they worked their magic.
meanings.sent4: The redecorators' creativity breathed life into the once dull office space.
meanings.sent5: The redecorators' attention to detail made every corner shine with beauty.
